https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mRevukL8oLf8VAtwRXOGss6hzp9.jpg Armada is a Brazilian short movie about the dictatorship times that laid its iron fist over the country. When a journalist is taken to the basement where the torture claim its victims, the truth is no more than a detail. Armada
